long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hides distracting items from the YouTube watch page (e.g. youtube.com/watch?v="oreZytDYoEU")

Blocks:
    - Related videos
    - Comments
    - Subscribe, like and dislike buttons
    - Super Thanks and Download buttons
    - "Shorts remixing this video" section
And possibly more depending on the video and device!

Simply click the extension icon to toggle between off and on states (provided you are on a supported page)
